name: Sheep Happens!
description:
3rd place at Fifty-Fifty Game Jam by Ten Square Games

Clean dirty sheeps at a SheepWash Station and bring clean sheeps to a Barbeeeer for a haircut! 

Then finish by carrying Wool Crate to a Barn to earn points before the other Wolf does it faster!

Protip 1: you can knock whatever the other Wolf is carrying from his hands!

Protip 2: you can score by bringing Wool Crate that IS NOT yours! :>

ALERT! 2 PLAYERS GAME ONLY!

CONTROLS:

Red Wolf : WSAD + SPACE

Blue Wolf: ARROWS + ENTER

TEAM:

Frontend - Marcin Michalak

Frontend / Backend - Franciszek Malinka

3D / Animacje - Maciej Hernik

UI / 3D - Jakub Misztal
